claims.claim: The incarceration of mothers has a devastating impact on communities.
claims.quote: And when you lock up a mom, you destroy a community.

claims.claim: Women incarcerated due to their relations with men face a unique set of challenges.
claims.quote: Women that are incarcerated are [...] because of direct action of a man or a dominant co-defendant who was forcing things on them.

claims.claim: Marginalized communities in Detroit face neglect in terms of resources and safety.
claims.quote: I'm not light enough. Because I'm not the right ethnicity [...] why is it that my resources, my cops, Can't come to my city block in a hurry like they do in all of the nice neighborhoods...

claims.claim: There is racial disparity in how justice-involved women are treated and perceived.
claims.quote: And the first time it happens to someone of another race, then all hell loose. And that's not fair.

claims.claim: Formerly incarcerated individuals are barred from volunteering in valuable community programs.
claims.quote: But yet cannot allow a parent to volunteer and help.

claims.claim: The Detroit public school system needs improvement, especially for the children of the incarcerated.
claims.quote: I do care about how my child is being educated in the Detroit public schools and their ratings.

claims.claim: Community involvement and beautification efforts in Detroit are not equally distributed.
claims.quote: I love the idea of the walk and the bike ride to be able to go from one city all the way downtown to the river walk.
